name: Calvin Dust FBI: The Florida Man Paradox
name_original: Calvin Dust FBI: The Florida Man Paradox
description:
CALVIN DUST FBI: THE FLORIDA MAN PARADOX

A game by Liam Pugh

Music by David Medellin

Based on code by Michael Baker

CALVIN DUST FBI: THE FLORIDA MAN PARADOX is an On-The-Rails adventure game where you traverse air, sea, and land!  Delve deep into the Florida wilderness as FBI agent Calvin Dust and discover the secret of the Florida Man and the spirit of the swamp.

Using Assets From:

NVJOB simple water shaders - Nicholas Veselov

ADG_Textures - a dog’s life software 

Industrial Tanks - Abandoned World

Barrier Pack - Sabri Ayes

Billboard - Mariam Sarishvili 

Bodyguards - Batewar

Coconut Palm Tree Pack - Baldinoboy

Destroyed_city_FREE - Profi Developers

DryTree - Andrey Graphics

Elven_Assassin - 3d.rina

Fishing Boat - HuNtEr_3DdD

First Person Arms - Nisanta 08

Eric Rigged 001 - RenderPeople

FPS Props - Silver Phoenix

Free Mountain - GameWarming

JMO Assets - Jean Moreno

M3A1 Scout Car - IGIIID

Oil Tank - Pixel Games

P38J Lightning - 42 seals games

RPG_FPS_Game_Assets_industrial - Dmitrii Kutsenko

Stylize Water Texture - LowlyPoly

War Plane - Omni Studio

World Skies - pulsar bytes

Packages

Umotion Editor - Soxware Interactive 

TextmeshPro
